name: Crowded Emptiness
description:
This game wasn't originally made to support android devices, but we made it possible, although playing it on your phone, you might notice that the textures look off, and light may look a little weird.

And when installing my game on an android device, the phone will give you a lot of warnings, and that's because I'm not a licensed android developer, and so play store will think that my app is dangerous. 

After all, I advice you to download the windows version for better experience.
